Altair material locations.script:
{_ EDDI obtiene estos datos de esta dirección http://api.eddp.co/_materiallocations } 


{if lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained by scanning system authority vessels.":
   Se obtiene escaneando naves de la autoridad del sistema.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained by scanning vessels.":
   Se obtiene escaneando naves.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained by scanning satellites orbiting installations and populated earth-like worlds.":
   Se obtiene escaneando satélites que orbitan instalaciones y mundos tipo tierra poblados.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained by scanning frame shift high wakes of vessels.":
   Se obtiene escaneando estelas de distorsión de alta intensidad de naves.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained from surface prospecting or asteroid mining.":
   Se obtiene mediante prospección de superficie o minando asteroides.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained by scanning datalinks in ground bases.":
   Se obtiene escaneando enlaces de datos en bases de superficie.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained as a mission reward.":
   Se obtiene como recompensa de misión.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained from the wreckage of haulage vessels.":
   Se obtiene de los restos de naves de transporte.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained from the wreckage of large haulage vessels, commonly type-7s and type 9s.  these are also available at dav's hope.":
   Se obtiene de los restos de grandes naves de transporte, normalmente tipo 7 y tipo 9. También hay disponibles en Deivs joup.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained by scanning large haulage vessels, commonly type-7s and type-9s .":
   Se obtiene de los restos de grandes naves de transporte, normalmente tipo 7 y tipo 9.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained from the wreckage of combat vessels.  these are also available at dav's hope.":
   Se obtiene de los restos de naves de combate. También hay disponibles en Deivs joup.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained from the wreckage of combat vessels.":
   Se obtiene de los restos de naves de combate.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained from the wreckage of large haulage and passenger vessels such as type-9s and beluga liners.  these are also available at dav's hope.":
   Se obtiene de los restos de grandes naves de transporte y cruceros de pasajeros, como las tipo 9 y las beluga. También hay disponibles en Deivs joup.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained in high-grade signal sources in systems under federal control.":
   Se obtiene en señales de alto nivel en sistemas bajo control federal.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained from the wreckage of combat and system authority vessels.":
   Se obtiene de los restos de naves de combate y de autoridad del sistema.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained from the wreckage of small combat vessels.":
   Se obtiene de los restos de naves de combate pequeñas.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained from the wreckage of small combat vessels.  these are also available at dav's hope.":
   Se obtiene de los restos de naves de combate pequeñas. También hay disponibles en Deivs joup.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained from the wreckage of large combat vessels, commonly anacondas and federal corvettes.  these are also available at dav's hope.":
   Se obtiene de los restos de grandes naves de combate, normalmente anacondas y corvetas federales. También hay disponibles en Deivs joup.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained from the wreckage of large combat vessels, commonly anacondas and federal corvettes.":
   Se obtiene de los restos de grandes naves de combate, normalmente anacondas y corvetas federales.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained in high-grade signal sources in systems under imperial control.":
   Se obtiene en señales de alto nivel en sistemas bajo control imperial.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained in high-grade signal sources in civil unrest systems.":
   Se obtiene en señales de alto nivel en sistemas con disturbios civiles.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained from the wreckage of small haulage vessels.  these are also available at dav's hope.":
   Se obtiene de los restos de naves de transporte pequeñas. También hay disponibles en Deivs joup
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained in high-grade signal sources in war or civil war systems.":
   Se obtiene en señales de alto nivel en sistemas en guerra o guerra civil.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained by scanning datalinks in ground bases or scanning private data beacons in encoded signal sources.":
   Se obtiene escaneando enlaces de datos en bases de superficie o escaneando balizas privadas de datos en fuentes de señales codificadas.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained in high-grade signal sources in outbreak systems.":
   Se obtiene en señales de alto nivel en sistemas con epidémias.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained in high-grade signal sources federal control.":
   Se obtiene en señales de alto nivel en sistemas bajo control federal.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained in high-grade signal sources in boom systems.":
   Se obtiene en señales de alto nivel en sistemas en auge.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained in high-grade signal sources in boom systems.":
   Se obtiene en señales de alto nivel en sistemas en auge.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained from the wreckage of ???. these are also available at dav's hope.":
   Se obtiene de restos de naves pero no tengo suficiente información sobre que tipo de naves. También pueden encontrarse disponibles en deivs joup.
|elif lcase (state.altair_locations) = "obtained by scanning haulage vessels.":
   Se obtiene escaneando naves de transporte.
|else:
   no se encuentra en mi banco de datos de localizaciones.
 }

Empire promotion.script:
{if event.rank = "Knight":
    Señor
|elif event.rank = "Lord":
    milord
|elif event.rank = "Baron":
    milord
|elif event.rank = "Viscount":
    milord
|elif event.rank = "Count":
    milord
|elif event.rank = "Earl":
    milord
|elif event.rank = "Marquis":
    milord
|elif event.rank = "Duke":
    su gracia
|elif event.rank = "Prince":
    su alteza real
|elif event.rank = "King":

|else:

La armada imperial

Honorific.script:
{if system.allegiance = "Empire":
    {if cmdr.empirerating.rank <= 4: 
       {OneOf ('comandante','señor')}
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 5:
        Señor
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank <= 11:
        milord
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 12:
        su excelencia
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 13:
        su alteza real
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 14:
        su majestad
    }
|elif system.allegiance = "Federation":
    {if cmdr.federationrating.rank = 0:
        comandante
    |elif cmdr.federationrating.rank = 1:
        recluta
    |elif cmdr.federationrating.rank = 2:
        cadete
    |elif cmdr.federationrating.rank = 3:
        guardiamarina
    |elif cmdr.federationrating.rank = 4:
        sargento
    |elif cmdr.federationrating.rank = 5:
        sargento primero
    |elif cmdr.federationrating.rank = 6:
        subteniente
    |elif cmdr.federationrating.rank = 7:
        Alférez de fragata
    |elif cmdr.federationrating.rank = 8:
        Teniente de navío
    |elif cmdr.federationrating.rank = 9:
        capitán de corbeta
    |elif cmdr.federationrating.rank = 10:
        capitán de fragata
    |elif cmdr.federationrating.rank = 11:
        capitán de navío
    |elif cmdr.federationrating.rank = 12:
        contraalmirante
    |elif cmdr.federationrating.rank = 13:
        vicealmirante
    |elif cmdr.federationrating.rank = 14:
        almirante
    }
|else:
    {OneOf ('comandante','señor')}
}
Honorific.name: Honorific
Honorific.description: Function to provide a suitable honorific for your commander

Module purchased.script:
You have purchased a {event.buymodule.class}-{event.buymodule.grade},

{if type(event.buymodule.mount) != "void":
    {for index, value in event.buymodule.mount: {set mount to value}}
    {if mount = 0:
        fixed
    |elif mount = 1:
        giimballed
    |elif mount = 2:
        turreted
    }
}
{event.buymodule.name} for {event.buyprice} credits

{if type(event.sellmodule) != "void":
    , and sold a {event.sellmodule.class}-{event.sellmodule.grade},

    {if type(event.sellmodule.mount) != "void":
        {for index, value in event.sellmodule.mount: {set mount to value}}
        {if mount = 0:
            fixed
        |elif mount = 1:
            giimballed
       |elif mount = 2:
            turreted
        }
    }
    {event.sellmodule.name} for {event.sellprice} credits

|elif type(event.storedmodule) != "void":
    , and stored a {event.storedmodule.class}-{event.storedmodule.grade},

    {if type(event.storedmodule.mount) != "void":
        {for index, value in event.storedmodule.mount: {set mount to value}}
        {if mount = 0:
            fixed
        |elif mount = 1:
            giimballed
       |elif mount = 2:
            turreted
        }
    }
    {event.storedmodule.name}
}
Module purchased.name: Module purchased
Module purchased.description: Triggered when you purchase a module in outfitting

Module swapped.script:
You have swapped the positions of a {event.frommodule.class}-{event.frommodule.grade},

{if type(event.frommodule.mount) != "void":
    {for index, value in event.frommodule.mount: {set mount to value}}
    {if mount = 0:
        fixed
    |elif mount = 1:
        giimballed
    |elif mount = 2:
        turreted
    }
}

{event.frommodule.name} and 

{if event.tomodule:
    a {event.tomodule.class}-{event.tomodule.grade},
    {if type(event.tomodule.mount) != "void":
        {for index, value in event.tomodule.mount: {set mount to value}}
        {if mount = 0:
            fixed
        |elif mount = 1:
            giimballed
        |elif mount = 2:
            turreted
        }
    }
    {event.tomodule.name}.
|else: 
    an empty slot.
}

System report.script:
{SetState("altair_potencia", system.power)}

{OneOf("Este es", "Este sistema es", "el sistema {system.name} es")}
{if system.government="Anarchy":
    un sistema anárquico 
|elif system.government="Colony":
    una colonia 
|elif system.government="Communism":
    un sistema comunista 
|elif system.government="Confederacy":
    una confederación 
|elif system.government="Cooperative":
    una cooperativa 
|elif system.government="Corporate":
    un sistema corporativo 
|elif system.government="Democracy":
    una democracia 
|elif system.government="Dictatorship":
    una dictadura 
|elif system.government="Feudal":
    un sistema feudal    
|elif system.government="Imperial":
    un sistema imperial 
|elif system.government="Patronage":
    un patronazgo 
|elif system.government="Prison Colony":
    una colonia penitenciaria 
|elif system.government="Theocracy":
    un sistema teocrático 
|elif system.government="Workshop":
    un sistema taller 
|elif system.government="Engineer":
    un sistema de ingeniero   
|else:
  un sistema 
}

{if system.allegiance = "Federation":
    de la Federación
|elif system.allegiance = "Empire":
    del imperio
|elif system.allegiance = "Alliance":
    de la alianza
|elif system.allegiance = "Independent":
    independiente
|else:
    no colonizado
},
{if (!system.population || system.population=0):
    {OneOf("Completamente deshabitado","Totalmente despoblado","que carece de población humana" )}
|else:
    {OneOf("con una población de", "hogar de", "que mantiene a")} {system.population} {OneOf("personas",   "habitantes")}
}
{if system.power:
    , {OneOf("alineado con", "aliado con", "controlado por")} {F("Altair nombres potencias")}
}.

{if system.faction:
  {OneOf("la potencia", "la facción")} {system.faction} es la que {OneOf("tiene el control", "posee el control")}.
}

{if len(system.stations) = 0:
  No hay estaciones 
|else:
    {if len(system.orbitalstations) = 0:
        {if len(system.planetarystations) = 1:
            Hay {OneOf("una única", "una solitaria", "solo una", "una")} estación planetaria
        |else:
            Hay {len(system.planetarystations)} estaciones planetarias
        }
    |elif len(system.orbitalstations) = 1:
        Hay {OneOf("una única", "una solitaria", "solo una", "una")} estación orbital 
        {if len(system.planetarystations) = 1:
            y {OneOf("una solitaria", "una única", "una","solo una")} estación planetaria
        |elif len(system.planetarystations) > 1:
            y {len(system.planetarystations)} estaciones planetarias 
        }
    |else:
        Hay {len(system.orbitalstations)} estaciones orbitales 
        {if len(system.planetarystations) = 1:
            y {OneOf("una solitaria", "una única", "una", "solo una")} estación planetaria
        |elif len(system.planetarystations) > 1:
            y {len(system.planetarystations)} estaciones planetarias 
        }
    }
}
{OneOf("aquí", "en este sistema")}.

{if system.state = "Boom":
    El sistema está en auge; {OneOf('por lo que podría obtener aquí buenos beneficios comerciales','por lo que puede haber buenas oportunidades comerciales aquí','puede haber interesantes oportunidades de negocio aquí')}.
|elif system.state = "Civil War":
    Este sistema está en guerra civil; debe tener cuidado.
|elif system.state = "Famine":
    Este sistema está sufriendo una hambruna; se recomienda precaución.
|elif system.state = "Lockdown":
    Este sistema está en quiebra; se recomienda precaución.
|elif system.state = "Outbreak":
    Este sistema está intentando contener una epidemia; se recomienda precaución.
|elif system.state = "War":
    Este sistema está en guerra; se recomienda precaución.
|elif system.state = "Expansion":
    Este sistema se está preparando para expandirse a otro sistema.
|elif reportsystem.state = "Bust":
    Este sistema está en quiebra financiera.
|elif reportsystem.state = "Election":
    Este sistema está eligiendo nuevos líderes.
|elif reportsystem.state = "Investment":
    Este sistema está realizando inversiones en sus infraestructuras.
}
